LoyaltyTierGroup.name: LoyaltyTierGroup
LoyaltyTierGroup.description: Represents information about tier groups of a loyalty program. Tier group categorizes members based on their loyalty points.

Category.description: The category of the loyalty tier group.

Description.description: Detailed description of the tier group.

EndDate.description: The end date of the loyalty tier group.

ExtendExpiration.description: Required. The field decides if the tier is changed on the exact day or the last day of the month.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the loyalty tier group is active (true) or not (false).

IsHiddenToMembers.description: Indicates whether the loyalty tier group is hidden (true) or not (false).

IsPrimary.description: Indicates whether the loyalty tier group is primary (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty tier group.

QpResetDate.description: Required. Start date of the QP reset process.

QpResetFrequency.description: Required. The frequency at which members’ qualifying points must be reset.

QpResetPeriod.description: Required. Unit of the period for QP reset.

StartDate.description: The start date of the loyalty tier group.

TierAssessmentCurrencyId.description: The ID of the Loyalty Program Currency that's used to assess and assign tiers to members of the loyalty program. Members are assigned tiers based on their points balance for the currency. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

TierModel.description: Required. It’s the model that decides the start date of the qualifying period.

TierPeriodQuantity.description: Required. The period after which members’ tier must be reset.

TierPeriodUnit.description: Required. The frequency type for the tier assessment.
